attributes.action: The invite to President Trump must not be withdrawn, under any Circumstances
attributes.additional_details: Dept of Homeland Security, policy on countries of concern/Travel restrictions for the Visa Waiver Program and the Terrorist Travel Prevention Act 2015. This was released 18/02/2016.. It was signed into law on the 18/December/2015, as part of the Ominbus Appropriations Act 2016
attributes.background: This so called 'Muslim Ban' was first bought up by President Clinton in 1995, read the report on the DHS website on the policy and you will see and read the truth... this policy was created by Obama in his Term, it was Obama that listed the countries involved.
